resources.string: OGC Nice, officially known as Olympique Gymnaste Club Nice CÃ´te d\'Azur, is a professional football club from Nice, France, founded in 1904. Competing in France\'s top division, Ligue 1, the club plays its home matches at the Allianz Riviera Stadium. Nicknamed \"Les Aiglons,\" OGC Nice has a long and proud history, having won several Ligue 1 titles and Coupe de France trophies throughout its existence.
